example_sentence_italian: Non voglio desolare nessuno.
example_sentence_english: I do not want to sadden anyone.

example_sentence_italian: Sto desolando il gruppo.
example_sentence_english: I am saddening the group.

example_sentence_italian: L'ho desolato senza volerlo.
example_sentence_english: I saddened him unintentionally.

example_sentence_italian: L'ho desolata con la notizia.
example_sentence_english: I saddened her with the news.

example_sentence_italian: Li ho desolati con la decisione.
example_sentence_english: I saddened them with the decision.

example_sentence_italian: Le ho desolate con la scelta.
example_sentence_english: I saddened them with the choice.

example_sentence_italian: Io desolo tutti con il mio pessimismo.
example_sentence_english: I sadden everyone with my pessimism.

example_sentence_italian: Tu desoli tuo fratello con quelle battute.
example_sentence_english: You sadden your brother with those jokes.

example_sentence_italian: La notizia desola la città.
example_sentence_english: The news devastates the city.

example_sentence_italian: Noi desoliamo i tifosi con la sconfitta.
example_sentence_english: We sadden the fans with the defeat.

example_sentence_italian: Voi desolate l'atmosfera.
example_sentence_english: You (plural) sadden the atmosphere.

example_sentence_italian: I bombardamenti desolano le campagne.
example_sentence_english: The bombings devastate the countryside.

example_sentence_italian: Da giovane desolavo gli amici con drammi inutili.
example_sentence_english: As a young person I was saddening my friends with useless drama.

example_sentence_italian: Tu desolavi tua madre con i ritardi.
example_sentence_english: You were saddening your mother with the delays.

translation_english: he was saddening/devastating/she was saddening/devastating/you (formal) were saddening/devastating
example_sentence_italian: La siccità desolava i campi.
example_sentence_english: The drought was devastating the fields.

example_sentence_italian: Desolavamo il pubblico con discorsi lunghi.
example_sentence_english: We were saddening the audience with long speeches.

example_sentence_italian: Voi desolavate tutti in ufficio.
example_sentence_english: You were saddening everyone at the office.

example_sentence_italian: Le guerre desolavano la regione.
example_sentence_english: Wars were devastating the region.

notes: used with auxiliary avere; past participle desolato
example_sentence_italian: Ho desolato il team con quella mail.
example_sentence_english: I have saddened the team with that email.

notes: used with auxiliary avere; past participle desolato
example_sentence_italian: Hai desolato tuo padre con le parole.
example_sentence_english: You have saddened your father with the words.

example_sentence_english: He has devastated the community with his choice.
